column4: ok, i'm using axel to download something, but the address i'm giving it has spaces, i tried canceling them out w/ backslashes and putting the address in quotes but it still doesn't find the site.
Can you demonstrate what you are trying?
That's some kind of weird bug... it doesn't support spaces in redirects
(Is that a song pack?  Is it decent?)
yeah its a song pack. i dunno how decent it is. the site i'm downloading from has 4 servers up, each w/a 60kbps downstream cap on it, thats why i'm trying to get axel working
the link you gave me didn't work
That's bizarre, it works perfectly fine here.
Try using wget to start downloading, ^C it, then use the link it gives you (=> http://something)
can wget pull a single file from multiple sources?
i never did figure out how to do that
No... I'm not suggesting you use wget to get the file, just to do the http redirect stuff
example? i don't know how to do that >.<
